S.FORM: Pipahosoan to tilifi no Yen cu min Yinmingtay han no holam no kwaping ko Tilifi no Yincuming. O sa'ayaway nikacitilifi no Yincuming i Taywan ato i salaloma' no Aziya. Edeng onini a cecay ko tilifi no mita o Yincuming. Itiya i 2004 mihecaan 12 a folad saka 1 a romi'ad a mahayda no Yinminghoy, saka mapatireng kona Tilifi no Yincuming, nikawrira i salaloma' no Tayseko polong no likakawa noya tilifi. Tangsa i 2005 mihecaan saka 8 a folad saka 23 a romi'ad a masomad, o Tongsen a Tilifi ko sitodongay. Namatira, i salaoma' nonini a demak, adihay ko nikalalifet no harateng no cisakowanay a tamdaw, tangasa i 2007 mihecaan saka 1 folod saka 1 a romi'ad ta so'linay o yincumingto ko sitodongay to polong no likakawa nora tilifi, ta i saka 4 folad saka 1 a rom'ad a mapangangan to Tilifi no Yincuming a saan. Itini i laloma' no tayal noya tilifi, mapolongay ko 'Amis, Taloko, Punun, Pariwan, Saysiya ato romaroma a fnacadan. Ano mipasadak sato to singpong ko singpongkisya hawi, makakotakotay ko painiay, macacalicaliw to romi'ad a papelo ato pasadak to masamaamaanay a kamok. O iraay a kamok anini i tilifi hawi, masilsil i rarikor: ! O singpongkisya i salaloma' nona Tilifi, masilsil ko ngangan i kaikor: Kolas Yotaka . . Pi'arawan to lakaw . (2011). Wikipedia 2011 . .
